name: Greygoo
description:
Greygoo is a tight-knit multidisciplinary team specializing in helping both start-ups and established brands conceive, build, launch and market successful digital products. Whether your challenge is conceptualizing and bringing an app, website or e-commerce store to life, improving the effectiveness of an existing one, or completely rethinking your strategy, our deep knowledge of user experience, product strategy, collaboration, coding and project management can help.
We are based in Naperville, IL (Chicago Western Suburbs) in the historic 5th Avenue Station building.
